channel.title: Resume Names on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Resume Names on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Equal Opportunity For Jobs or Lack of it: Results Unknown
item.description: “What is the truth behind hiring bias? Does it exist, and if so how prevalent is it? Through the statistics of resume names, we are somewhat closer to the truth.” Racism and discrimination are still prevalent topics in today’s society. The effects of both reach almost all aspects of life. One of those aspects is the job market. Historically, companies were more likely to hire someone with a white sounding name over someone ca with a black sounding name.
